title: Our (and Every Teen in New York’s) Favorite Nikes Are Just $99
text:
1 item in this article Photo: Courtesy of the Retailer

New York City teens love Nike Air Force 1s, but sneakerheads and stylish adult humans have also described them as the best white sneakers for women. “Their versatility makes it a staple piece in my closet,” Michelle Silva, co-founder of the Con.cept, told us, adding, “Always keep a clean pair in your closet.” So, if you’re looking to refresh your old Nike Air Force 1s, or add to your sneaker collection, or even try these classic sneakers out for the first time, may we recommend these on-sale suede ones? They’re technically mint, not white, but the color is subtle enough that they’ll still work with any outfit. The deconstructed look also feels a bit more fashion than sporty, though it’s still got that signature Air Force 1 shape and swoosh. And right now, these Air Force 1s are just $99 at Urban Outfitters, 18 percent off the list price.

Nike Air Force 1 ’07 Deconstructed Sneaker $99 (was $120, now 18% off) $99 at Urban Outfitters Buy

description: Nike Air Force 1 ’07 Deconstructed Sneaker for women in Mint are on sale at Urban Outfitters for just $99, 18 percent off the list price of $120.
